text: गोपाल जी, आज आप हिस्ट्री क्लास में क्या पढ़ा रहे थे? आप कह रहे थे कि Tata Sky अप Tata Play हो गया है. ये कैसी हिस्ट्री क्लास है? गीता जी, Tata Sky का Tata Play होना बहुत ही historical moment है. इसलिए पढ़ा रहा था. अच्छा, तो और कौन-कौन से historical moments है? वैसे कल आपका स्माइल करना, मेरे लिए काफी historical था. अब Tata Sky है Tata Play. नाम बदल डाला, क्योंकि entertainment और भी जिंग अलाला.

segments.text: गोपाल जी, आज आप हिस्ट्री क्लास में क्या पढ़ा रहे थे?
segments.translated_text: Gopal ji, what were you teaching in the history class today?

segments.text: आप कह रहे थे कि Tata Sky अप Tata Play हो गया है.
segments.translated_text: You were saying that Tata Sky has become Tata Play.
What kind of history class is this?

segments.text: गीता जी, Tata Sky का Tata Play होना बहुत ही historical moment है.
segments.translated_text: Geeta ji, Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very historical moment.

segments.text: अच्छा, तो और कौन-कौन से historical moments है?
segments.translated_text: Okay, so what other historical moments are there?

segments.text: वैसे कल आपका स्माइल करना, मेरे लिए काफी historical था.
segments.translated_text: By the way, your smile yesterday was quite historical for me.

segments.text: अब Tata Sky है Tata Play.
segments.translated_text: Now Tata Sky is Tata Play.

segments.text: नाम बदल डाला, क्योंकि entertainment और भी जिंग अलाला.
segments.translated_text: I changed the name because there is more entertainment and more zing.

translated_text: Gopal ji, what were you teaching in the history class today? You were saying that Tata Sky has become Tata Play. What kind of history class is this? Geeta ji, Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very historical moment. That's why I was teaching. So, what are the other historical moments? By the way, your smiling yesterday was quite historical for me. Now Tata Sky is Tata Play. I changed the name because there is more entertainment and more zing.
